description: Claude Code settings optimized for RamseyCoach - Next.js booking platform with Airtable integration

project.name: RamseyCoach
project.description: Personal financial coaching booking platform with Airtable backend

dev.description: Start Next.js development server on port 3000

lib/airtable.ts.purpose: Handles all database interactions with Airtable REST API

lib/timezone.ts.purpose: Client-side timezone detection and EST conversion

components/BookingModal.tsx.description: Booking calendar and appointment selection modal
components/BookingModal.tsx.purpose: Main booking interface - calendar view with available time slots

components/Testimonials.tsx.purpose: Displays client testimonials in carousel format

pages.pages/index.tsx: Home page with hero, testimonials, booking section
pages.pages/api/availability.ts: GET endpoint for available time slots
pages.pages/api/contact.ts: POST endpoint for contact form submissions
pages.pages/api/testimonials.ts: GET endpoint for testimonials from Airtable

environment.note: Copy .env.local.example to .env.local and fill in values before running

architecture.rendering: Mixed - server-side and client-side, dynamic imports for Airtable components
architecture.apiLayer: Next.js API routes as middleware to Airtable
architecture.styling: Tailwind CSS with utility classes (primary: green, secondary: brown, accent: gold)
architecture.seo: Next.js Head, canonical URLs, Open Graph, Schema.org markup

examples: Update booking system to use Availability table

react: Memoization where needed for expensive renders
tailwind: Utility-first CSS with PurgeCSS for production

important: No test infrastructure yet - consider adding Jest/Vitest
.next/ directory must be generated via 'npm run build'
Environment variables required from Airtable setup
Dynamic imports used to prevent SSR issues with Airtable components
improvements: Add E2E testing with Cypress or Playwright
Add unit tests for lib/timezone.ts and lib/airtable.ts
Consider adding Husky for pre-commit hooks
Consider database migrations strategy for Airtable schema changes
resources: TypeScript config in tsconfig.json - strict mode enabled
Tailwind config in tailwind.config.ts - custom color palette
ESLint config in .eslintrc.json - Next.js + web vitals
